name: Purgatory Layoffs
description:
Plot

It's the dreaded all-staff meeting and Purgatory Inc's CEO Adam Synder announces that there must be layoffs even if profits and revenue are sky-high.

Unfortunately for you, in purgatory layoffs mean death ... again. Permanently.

Become the #1 ranked employee in your department by outmaneuvering and beating your coworkers into submission.

It's either them or you.

Controls ControlKeyboardGamepad (XBOX)Move your workerWASDLeft Stick
Collect / InteractEAAttackLeft Mouse/SpaceRight TriggerSprintLeft ShiftLeft Trigger About

This game was made in 10 days for the Gamedev.tv Jam 2022 in Unreal Engine 5. This uses CC0 (or similar) assets from FreeSound, The Base Mesh, Sketchfab, Quaternius, Pexels, OpenGameArt.Org.
